name: ConnedTra
description:
A Community Game jam game.

A totally honest straight-forward shootem-up with no stealth elements. Can you survive? Also contains LOOTBOXES!

If you manage to get the "Congratulations" do not spill the beans!(i.e. Do not tell anyone!)

If you manage to get the "We're Impressed" post a video.

[A] [D] to move left and right.

[Space bar] to jump.

[Left click] to shoot.

[F] to go through doors and activate the terminal.

[Escape] to open and close settings.
